commandDescription: export excel spreadsheet of profiles and permission sets
filePathFlagDescription: file path for the output file. defaults to current directory. the directory path must exist.
includedComponentsFlagDescription: a comma delimited list of profile or permission set components to include in output file. all types are included if this option is omitted. valid types include the following: applicationVisibilities, categoryGroupVisibilities, classAccesses, customMetadataTypeAccesses, customPermissions, customSettingAccesses, externalDataSourceAccesses, fieldPermissions, flowAccesses, layoutAssignments, loginFlows, loginHours, loginIpRanges, objectPermissions, pageAccesses, profileActionOverrides, recordTypeVisibilities, tabSettings, userPermissions
permissionSetNamesFlagDescription: a comma delimited list of permission set names. enclose in permission set names contain spaces.
profileNamesFlagDescription: a comma delimited list of profile names. enclose in quotes if profile names contain spaces.
